title: 446. “We Get All Our Great Stuff from Europe — Including Witch Hunting.”
description: We’ve collected some of our favorite moments from People I (Mostly) Admire, the latest show from the Freakonomics Radio Network. Host Steve Levitt seeks advice from scientists and inventors, memory wizards and basketball champions — even his fellow economists. He also asks about quitting, witch trials, and whether we need a Manhattan Project for climate change.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
